metadata.title: CVE-2016-10206 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Zoneminder 1.30 andearlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of users forrequests that change passwords and possibly have unspecified other impactas demonstrated by a crafted user action request to index.php.

criterions.comment: zoneminder: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
